overview: Eric Masterson enters the massage parlor reception area, apologizing for being late. Masseuse Michele James tells him that he’s at the right place if he’s stressed. Vina Sky is not paying much attention to her surroundings. Suddenly a voice saying "Excuse me, hi, I'm here for a massage?" gets her attention, and she looks up a bit startled. When she sees Lucas Frost’s face, her jaw drops.
title: Risky Business
